trans-unit.target: [NEW] Added multilingual support, translation can be done using the Crowdin service. A link in the footer of each module.
[NEW] Added the ability to view logs on a separate page.
[UPDATE] Installer simplified. Dependencies are now downloaded and installed the first time you open [every] plugin. It may take a few minutes. Now the installer weighs is much smaller.
[UPDATE] Roll back functions that used the DLEFiles class. It does not work with third-party developments as it should.
[UPDATE] It was decided to use the standard DLE classes to work with files
[NEW] Added functionality to check for plugin updates
[UPDATE] Changed the approach to some classes
[FIX] Returned the necessary but deleted files
[NEW] Added the function of sending logs in telegram [BETA]
[NEW] Added the ability for the user to decide for himself whether to use updated icons in the admin panel or not
[NEW] Added the ability for the user to decide whether to connect the global button for clearing the cache in the admin panel or not
[NEW] Further work with the database will occur only through the model classes created by me. For this, you will use the functionality of the Model and Table classes

[UPDATE] Error logging will occur in the future through the Monolog - Logging for PHP</a><a href="https://seldaek.github.io/monolog/" target="_blank">. With the functionality enabled - the library will send notifications to the browser console, as well as save files to the log folder
[UPDATE] Updating libraries to the latest versions with the lowest possible PHP version <b>7.2.9</b>
[UPDATE] FontAwesome 6.1.1 Pro icons are connected, the light option is used (please report not available or missing icons)
[FIX] Documented classes with little explanation of what makes which function and what a variable is used for.
Due to some circumstances, it was necessary to abandon the i18n module. Perhaps it will be released as a separate module.
Updating dependencies to the minimum required PHP version 7.4
For those who want to create a plugin based on my admin panel, the function of generating paths and files was created
FontAwesome has been updated to version 6
Added check for the integrity of files and their updates
Completely new admin panel, which does not depend on the design and functionality of the DLE itself
The panel was based on the Twig engine, it will be easier to create your own templates
Clearing the cache in the admin panel has become easier - the button was displayed in a row with "Add news" and "Edit news"
i18n is implemented in the DLE system, it makes it possible to create multilingual sites (the module will be sold separately or will not be done)
i18n: database independent, all phrases are stored in json files
i18n: in templates, it is enough to use the {trans text="here translated text"} tag to translate the phrase
i18n: in PHP scripts, it is enough to use the translate function to translate the phrase

i18n: In JS scripts, it is enough to use the translateJS function ("here is the translated text") to translate the phrase. It is advisable to load phrases when the page is loaded, because async is not finalized
as well as the output of news and static pages on the site
i18n: Machine translation via RapidApi service is supported
i18n: dynamic usage that does not require data arrays - just specify the text
small fix in the language file
Adding language files (it will be easier to localize modules in the future)
Automatic output of additional fields in the admin panel
Upgrading to the latest versions of the DLE
Specify the path where the cache files will be stored.<br>Default: /engine/inc/maharder/_cache

Enter the time in minutes, how much the cache of requests should be stored on the server. When requested, the script will check when the cache file was created and if it exceeds the specified limit, the cache will be recreated.<br><b><i>Default: 60 minutes</i></b>
This option will allow you to use the admin panel and modules in different languages
Specify the path where the language files will come from.<br>Default: /engine/inc/maharder/_locales
When enabled, text logs will be created in the <b>folder engine/inc/maharder/_logs</b>
If you enable this parameter, all logs will be saved to the database
When this parameter is enabled, all logs will be through the ChromeLogger <a href="https://craig.is/writing/chrome-logger" target="_blank"></a>.
With the parameter enabled, all logs will be through the FirePHP <a href="http://www.firephp.org/" target="_blank"></a>.
With the option enabled, all logs will be in the browser or in the console.
With the parameter enabled and the fields below are filled in - the script will send logs to your telegram channel

API key bot, which can be obtained from the <a href="https://t.me/BotFather" target="_blank">@BothFather</a>, more detailed information <a href="https://readme.devcraft.club/latest/dev/telegramposting/bot/" target="_blank">here</a>.
How to get a channel ID can be found <a href="https://readme.devcraft.club/latest/dev/telegramposting/bot/#_5" target="_blank">here</a>.
When enabled, the old icons in the DLE admin panel will be replaced with updated ones
Add a button to clear the cache?
For now, you can choose between light (standard) and dark. Save and refresh the page
<p>Data has been saved!</p><p>Page is now refreshed!</p>
